actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make certain individuals who served in the Armed Forces on active duty for training eligible for educational assistance and for home, condominium, and mobile home loan benefits.

summary.text: Includes time spent in training by non-Reserve members of the armed forces as active duty for purposes of educational and home loan benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make certain individuals who served in the Armed Forces on active duty for training eligible for educational assistance and for home, condominium, and mobile home loan benefits.
